tool_description: An AI service from Microsoft Azure that enables secure, ad-free location search for your users, displaying relevant information from web results, images, local businesses, news, and photos.

api_list.name: Web Search API
api_list.description: Search data and suggested keywords from the Bing search engine.

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of the results to return.

api_list.name: Images Search
api_list.description: Search images from the search engine for the most relevant keywords and images related to keywords.

required_parameters.name: keyword
required_parameters.description: The keyword to search for images.

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of the results to return.

api_list.name: Emails Search
api_list.description: Search emails from search engines for related keywords.

required_parameters.name: keyword
required_parameters.description: The keyword to search for emails.
